<script>
    requirejs(['domReady!'], function (doc) {
        requirejs(['app/GeoLocation/GeoLocationUtils'], function (exp) {
            $('#d36485e6-b665-40e4-8091-579c0116c994').on('submit', function (e) {
                e.preventDefault();
                var newZip = $('#txtZipCode').val();
                if (newZip)
                    exp.GeoLocationUtils.GeoLocation.overrideZip(newZip);
            });
            exp.GeoLocationUtils.GeoLocation.positionChanged.on(function (args) {
                if (args && args.zip) {
                    args.zip.then(function (zipCode) {
                        $('#txtZipCode').val(zipCode);
                    }, function (reason) {
                        $('#txtZipCode').val('');
                    });
                }
            });
        });
    });
</script>

	<div class="alert-warning">
		<span class="icon-alert"></span> If this is an emergency please dial <span itemprop="telephone"><a class="tel value" href="tel:+911">911</a></span>
	</div>
	<div class="l-row">	
		<div class="actionsheet-inner">
		    <h2 id="hGetInLineLocationName"></h2>
            <div id="actionSheetContactInfo">
                <div class="adr" itemprop="address" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/PostalAddress">
                    <a id="lnkMap" target="_blank">
                        <div class="street-address" itemprop="streetAddress">
                            <span id="sLabel" class="icon-pin" aria-hidden="true"></span>
                            <span id="sAddressLine1" name="addressLine1" class="street-address1"></span><span id="sAddressLine2" class="street-address2" visible="False"></span>
                        </div>
                        <span id="spLocality" name="locality" class="locality" itemprop="addressLocality"></span>

			   				<li class="icon-time-slot">You may lose your place in line if you arrive 15 minutes or more after your scheduled arrival time.</li>

                    <p class="global-footer__about-text"><p>Intermountain Healthcare is a Utah-based, not-for-profit system of 22 hospitals, a Medical Group with more than 1,600 physicians and advanced practice clinicians at about 180 clinics, a health plans division called SelectHealth, and other health services. Helping people live the healthiest lives possible, Intermountain is widely recognized as a leader in clinical quality improvement and in efficient healthcare delivery.</p></p>
